literallayout:
2006-12-17 Jens Persson
* Added Functions and Constants * Minor fixes
2006-03-10 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.Query * Minor fixes
2006-03-03 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.Bin * Added new class gst.Pipeline * Minor fixes
2006-02-27 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.Message * Some cosmetic changes in .css * Minor fixes
2006-02-23 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.Event * Completed class gst.Caps
2006-02-21 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.Buffer * Added new class gst.Caps * Import into SVN on berlios.de
2006-02-13 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added new class gst.MiniObject * Added new class gst.PadTemplate * Added new class gst.GhostPad
2006-02-10 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* A bunch of fixes * Added new class gst.Pad * Modified css
2006-01-23 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Completed class gst.Element * Added new class gst.Bus
2006-01-14 Gian Mario Tagliaretti <g.tagliaretti # parafernalia.org>
* Added css to handle colors in some deprecated xsl tags * Modified gst.Element class according to new API

* Created first few chapters
